```{r}
load("c:/tempDir/out/ls_1996_April11.Rdata")
load("c:/tempDir/out/ls_2007_April11.Rdata")
load("c:/tempDir/out/ls_2011_April11.Rdata")
load("c:/tempDir/out/nonls_1996_April11.Rdata")
load("c:/tempDir/out/nonls_2007_April11.Rdata")
load("c:/tempDir/out/nonls_2011_April11.Rdata")
ls_2007$geo <- ls_2007$geo$GeoClass
ls_2011$geo <- ls_2011$geo$GeoClass
ls <- ls_1996
ls <- rbind(ls,ls_2007)
ls <- rbind(ls,ls_2011)
nonls <- nonls_1996
nonls <- rbind(nonls,nonls_2007)
nonls <- rbind(nonls,nonls_2011)
ls$class <- as.factor(ls$class)
nonls$class <- as.factor(nonls$class)
ls$geo <- as.factor(ls$geo)
nonls$geo <- as.factor(nonls$geo)
all_ls <- rbind(ls,nonls)
all_ls$iclass <- ifelse(all_ls$class == "pos", 1, 0)
```
